title: 'Brexit' speed-dating? I'd like to Remain but I think I'll Leave
text:
Is Brexit stopping singles from either side of the debate from dating each other? Lucy Holden tries out a Brexit-themed speed-dating event to find out...

What are you doing tomorrow night? With no chance of leaving the EU the next day, you might be settling in to the idea of celebrating Halloween instead. But for those who want to combine the two – and who also happen to be single – may I suggest an evening of Halloween Brexit speed-dating?

Event organisers DateinaDash are inviting singletons on both sides of the debate to a pub in Balham, London, for an evening which poses the question, ‘Are you ready to leave the single market forever and meet someone worth remaining for?’

It’s a question...
description: Is Brexit stopping singles from either side of the debate from dating each other?
